channel.title: Ways to cheat in School
channel.description:
post your ways to cheat on tests in school here!
I use my picture cell phone and take a picture of my notes and just use that on the test without the teacher noticing!

item.title: Ways to cheat in School
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Swordskid61, post:433, topic:3142”]he didn’t spell please incorrectly, he made a typing error.[/quote]Quite frankly, when he spelled “Plox”, he intentionally spelled it wrong.

item.title: Ways to cheat in School
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“fellixombc, post:431, topic:3142”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=3624.msg1983784#msg1983784 date=1199740127]

I don’t cheat in school. I just listen to the teacher and take notes when I’m supposed to. I get straight A’s most of the time and I try pretty hard.
[/quote] Yet you can’t spell Please.

exe, i think even if he even cheated on a test that he wouldn’t even spell the words right.

just because you can’t spell doesn’t mean you can’t spell it, its called typing errors.

wtf are you talking about? Srsly, if you don’t make sense the shut up.[/quote]
he didn’t spell please incorrectly, he made a typing error.

Read full topic

item.title: Ways to cheat in School
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

I had a math teacher, that would give us all the problems and how to do them, and we could remember them.

However, I wouldn’t study, I was setting on the other side of the room from the teacher, so I’d hide it under my sratch paper and when he looked lay it down, between the two sheets of paper. Then when I went to turn it in, put it in my NoteBook and go give him the test.

HOWEVER [ONCE MORE :)] if he tells you to work the study guide out, GOOGLE.COM

Read full topic
